QuestData.Title: Kyrestia, the Firstborne
QuestData.Description:
I will escort you to hold audience with the Archon.
I beseech you to present your information succinctly and directly.
Our wise Archon will hear you and make a decision on the best course of action.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Adrestes to address the Archon.
QuestData.RewardText: The Archon's grace is upon you, mortal.
